pull.title: depends: Fix CMake-generated `libzmq.pc` file
pull.body:
This is a backport of: https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/pull/4706.

Similar to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30488.

Addresses https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29723#issuecomment-2239864170:
> Looking at the mingw .pc generated by this PR:
> 
> ```
> Libs: -L${libdir} -lzmq
> Libs.private:
> Requires.private:
> ```
> 
> It looks like we'll need to take [zeromq/libzmq#4706](https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/pull/4706) as well for CMake. That can be done as a follow-up though, as it's not yet merged upstream.

verification.payload:
tree 92c7e1479b2d9a1107bc236218ad84f8bb75c5cc
parent 51ac4792e571623af69a6c3e1031900ea962dce1
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1721742266 +0100
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1721742593 +0100

depends: Fix CMake-generated `libzmq.pc` file

See https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/pull/4706.

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ðŸ‘Ž to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.
Concept ACK and utACK. I'd rather wait until upstream weighs in though, since we don't need this at least until we switch to CMake.

> I'd rather wait until upstream weighs in though, since we don't need this at least until we switch to CMake.

Looks like upstream either forgot about, or missed this, so I guess someone should followup.
Could rebase the upstream pull, which currently fails CI, to pick up the upstream CI fixes?

> Could rebase the upstream pull, which currently fails CI, to pick up the upstream CI fixes?

Done.

> > I'd rather wait until upstream weighs in though, since we don't need this at least until we switch to CMake.
> 
> Looks like upstream either forgot about, or missed this, so I guess someone should followup.

It has been just [merged](https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/commit/5f408ba371ae4789549fb4696dcccd2ac946b7eb).
